title: Perspective Rendering of a Town House
description: Perspective rendering of four-story house of William E. Lescaze.  Office with glass block on ground floor.  Rounded-edge canopy over stairwell with curved banister at left, leading to residence above.  Second floor with horizontal row of windows that curve at left edge.  Third floor with glass block and two casement windows.  Fourth floor all glass block.  Building projects in front of existing, flanking architecture.  Rendering includes two figures at lower right.
name: Print
